page.title: 12HOUSING
page.content: We conducted a survey of the houses that lie within the catchment area of Whites Wood Lane School.We were not able to find out about each house,so we collected a large sample from children at the school.We asked them about the number of rooms,number of people,type of house and whether they had a garage.The average size of a family was four people,although several families contained five or six.Over 70% of families had four,five or six people.We were surprised to find that 10% of the families had five children.Well over half of the houses had garages,and 15% were bungalows.Almost exactly half of the houses had seven rooms,which includes a bathroom/toilet.40% had six rooms. 20%,the largest group,contained four people,had seven rooms and a garage.
